summary: REQ-7 is largely implemented by adding a keyboard-accessible "Home" button in the hero header that remounts the guided flow (via a changing React key) and scrolls the page to the top without introducing routing.

missing_requirements.requirement: A clearly visible navigation/menu area includes a "Home" option labeled exactly "Home".
missing_requirements.reason: The implementation hides the text label "Home" on small screens (`hidden sm:inline`), leaving only an icon visible; this may not satisfy the requirement that the option be labeled exactly "Home" in a clearly visible way across viewports.
